songs.title: Pose
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah)
Here, (here), you're (higher, higher, higher, higher), higher)
Get me high

[Chorus]
Pose for the camera, just pose
Put on some, (Ah) nice clothes
I'm your lover, i'm the one you chose
Just pose, I said, just pose

[Verse 1]
No one knows, that
We're alone, and
How things go, highs and lows
Go real slow, red rose
Red nose, cons and pros

[Pre-Chorus]
Babe, I know that you want it
So, babe come upon it
I'll give a private show
Babe, all you have to do is pose

[Chorus]
Pose for the camera, just pose
Put on some, (Ah) nice clothes
I'm your lover, i'm the one you chose
Just pose, I said, just pose

[Verse 2]
Spray me down like a hose, and
So cold, I just froze
Your the one I chose
Throw me something I throw
From my head to my toes
I don't want you to go

[Pre-Chorus]
Babe, I know that you want it
So, babe come upon it
I'll give a private show
Babe, all you have to do is pose

[Chorus]
Pose for the camera, just pose
Put on some, (Ah) nice clothes
I'm your lover, i'm the one you chose
Just pose, I said, just pose

[Bridge]
Pose for the camera (just pose)
Aim and shoot just pose for the camera (just pose)
You already know how it goes (just pose)
All you have to do is pose

[Pre-Chorus]
Babe, I know that you want it
So, babe come upon it
I'll give a private show
Babe, all you have to do is pose

[Chorus]
Pose for the camera, just pose
Put on some, (Ah) nice clothes
I'm your lover, i'm the one you chose
Just pose, I said, just pose
Just, just, just, just pose
